vsParam:
Ah, you guys. Perfect timing!
I have a favor to ask of you, may I?

I want you to collect some materials for my
next wizardry medicine class.

I am really busy right now.
Would you do this for me?

Thank you! Ahhh, you are so reliable...
I am so happy!

Ho ho, of course!
Do the work and wait for it, [px].

"Never forget to confirm the remuneration when undertaking
the commission". You did it well, I am so happy!

Ha-ha, we haven't done anything yet, and we just got a
compliment. Majorum Sensei loves students too much...

Uh? The material in your hand,
will you use it in the next lesson?

Yes, I will. I want to add something new
to my conventional teaching.

I bet everyone will enjoy the lesson...
And have a good time. Because...

Ho ho. I can't wait to give the lesson just by
thinking about the expression on everyone's face!

Uh? Uh? What, what is it!?
I am intrigued...
Well... I'll reveal the mystery in class.

*Sob sob*, I am so curious...
Any, anyway, let's go collect materials first, [px]!

Majorum Sensei, we have brought
the materials you asked!

Wow, thank you!
Now we can have the lesson properly.

It's a rare chance. Why don't you take my lesson too?
I am sure you are curious what this lesson will be like, right?

Let's start our wizardry medicine lesson today.
Today, we are going to...

S, sensei, are you serious?
Are we really going to make cookies?

Yep. I've given out the recipe
to make cookies. But...

This cookie will have the same effect as wizardry medicine. Look
at the materials and steps carefully. I believe you can see it, no?

Ah... Really. This cookie, if we make it according to the recipe,
it will have the effect of wizardry medicine!

Yes. Today's lesson will be a fun and delicious one.
Great, let's all get started♪

When you are done, remember to couple it with nice tea.
See it effects while enjoying the delicious refreshment.

I see. Although it's kind of unexpected...
Such a class seems pretty nice.

Yes, I really look forward to the cookies!
Okay, let's start making them, [px]!
